name: The Expensive Tale of Mr. Henry Crabs (Web Version)
name_original: The Expensive Tale of Mr. Henry Crabs (Web Version)
description:
Experience life through the eyes of Mr. Henry Crabs. He is down on his luck and he and his family need your help. Can you help them experience the fairy tale that life is?

P.S. - Player discretion is advised  as some sensitive things might be covered in the game.

Dev  Notes- 

1. Please complete the game to understand its relevance  to the theme.

2. Please press Return/Enter on every screen that has text on it to continue 

3. The game may have some bugs as this is our first jam.

4. Do not hesitate to use the REPLAY feature (For some levels, we spammed it ourselves :P)

5. All constructive criticism is welcome

6. Enjoy the game.
